name: Wasteland (itch) (Usagi Games)
description:
Game Description:

You play as an explorer who goes from planet to planet with his spaceship. He likes to explore differnet worlds with his companion. Unfortunately, your spaceship gets hit by a comet and you crash on an unknown planet....But is this planet vacant? you don't know anything about this weird Wasteland so...be careful!

Repository Link:

https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/wasteland/src/master/

Relase Notes:

Version 1.0
